name: FLAPPY HEAD
description:
FLAPPY HEAD is a simple arcade time-killer, where you should just fly as long as you can evading traps on your way.

FEATURES:

- hardcore one-tap gameplay;
- colorful pixel graphics;
- 8-bit sounds;
- unlockable hats;
- global leaderboards;
- interesting achievements, including hidden ones.

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER FOR MORE INFORMATION ABOUT OUR FUTURE PROJECTS.

E-MAIL FOR FEEDBACK: contact.dtuniverse@gmail.com.
